qa_pair.question: Generate a single image of a cute baby sea otter floating on its back. What is the model name used and how many tokens were consumed?

Create 3 images with these prompts: "A sunset over mountains", "A futuristic city at night", "A serene lake with reflections". How many images were successfully generated and what is the total token count?
Generate a widescreen (16:9) image of a panoramic landscape. What are the dimensions of the output image?
Create an Instagram feed post (4:5 aspect ratio) of a modern office space. What are the dimensions and what is the default output format?
Generate a square (1:1) logo with transparent background. Which output format supports transparency and what are the dimensions?
Create 5 variations of abstract geometric patterns using batch generation. If each image uses 1290 tokens, what is the total cost at $30 per 1M tokens?
Generate a portrait-oriented (9:16) Instagram Story image. What are the dimensions and what tool should be used for a single image?
Create a batch of 10 logo variations with aspect ratio 1:1 in WebP format. What is the maximum number of concurrent images supported and which tool handles batch generation?
Generate a JPEG image of a photograph scene. Why is JPEG format converted to RGB mode and what quality setting is used?
Create 3 marketing assets in 16:9 format and compare the cost per image to OpenAI GPT-4 Image high quality. How much cheaper is Gemini per image?
qa_pair.answer: ~$0.003-0.013 cheaper (~3.5x cheaper than GPT-4 high quality at $0.036-0.052)
